Question: How was the smaller white dog positioned at the start of the video?

Reference Answer: 3

Video ID: 7163754671

Original program:

```
ANSWERS0=VIDQA(video=VIDEO,question="How is the smaller white dog positioned?")
ANSWER0=SELECT(question="How was the smaller white dog positioned at the start of the video?",information=ANSWERS0,choices=CHOICES)
FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER0)
```
Program:

```

FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER0)

The background includes a white object that looks like a piece of paper or a small box.

The black dog remains mostly stationary, while the darker dog continues to be partially visible. The light-colored dog then approaches a gray pet carrier, sniffing around it. The black dog follows closely, and both dogs seem to be exploring the area near the carrier. The light-colored dog eventually moves away from the carrier, while the black dog stays close by. The background now includes an orange bucket and some other household items.

The video continues with the same three dogs on the wooden floor. The light-colored dog is now closer to the camera, appearing curious and attentive. The black dog is also near the camera, looking up with interest. The darker dog is partially visible again, standing further back.
